summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3681 for the improvement of 35th Avenue Southwest, from West Myrtle Street to West Kenyon Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45350, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
